field.label: Access List Name
field.help: Enter a name for this access list.

field.label: Client IP Addresses
field.help: Enter the client IP addresses or networks for this access list. Accepts multiple IPv4/IPv6 addresses or networks.

field.label: Invert List
field.help: If checked, the access list logic will be inverted (i.e., the listed IPs will be blocked instead of allowed).

field.label: Description
field.help: Enter a description for this access list.
